org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.legend

Interface ILegend

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Persistent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBarsChartLegend, IChartLegend, IClassifiedLegend, IClassifiedRasterLegend, IClassifiedVectorLegend, ILinkedChartLegend, IPieChartLegend, IRasterLegend, ISingleSymbolLegend, IVectorialIntervalLegend, IVectorialUniqueValueLegend, IVectorLegend, VectorComplexLegend
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassifiedVectorLegend, AbstractIntervalLegend, AbstractLegend, AbstractVectorialLegend, BarsChartLegend, ColorTableLegend, DefaultVectorComplexLegend, ImageLegend, LegendControl, LinkedChartLegend, PieChartLegend, SingleSymbolLegend, VectorialIntervalLegend, VectorialUniqueValueLegend

    public interface ILegend
extends Persistent, Cloneable
    Information about the legend to be represented in the interface.
